member.name: IHWEventHandler.HandleEvent
member.summary: Handles AutoPlay device events for which there is no content of the type the application is registered to handle.
member.param: A pointer to a string buffer that contains the device ID.
A pointer to a string buffer that contains the alternate device ID. The alternate device ID is more human-readable than the primary device ID.
A pointer to a string buffer that contains the event type. The event types include DeviceArrival, DeviceRemoval, MediaArrival, and MediaRemoval.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IHWEventHandler.HandleEventWithContent
member.returns: This method does not return a value.

member.name: IHWEventHandler.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes an object that contains an implementation of the interface.

param.name: pszParams
param.para: A pointer to a string buffer that contains the string from the following registry value.
param.code: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE Software Microsoft Windows CurrentVersion Explorer AutoPlayHandlers Handlers HandlerName InitCmdLine = string

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IHWEventHandler
member.summary: Called by AutoPlay to implement the handling of registered media types.
